name: prizmcloud
title: Prizm Cloud Document Viewer jQuery Plugin
description: jQuery plugin allows you to display the Prizm Cloud Document Viewer with clickable thumbnails which update the base viewer with the new document dynamically. Multiple viewers can be on the same page. Prizm Cloud is a cloud based document viewer, so you can display over three hundred different file types on your website, while the documents stay on your server without additional installation of software or hardware.
